# Exploratory Data Analysis
```{r}
setwd("./Data/")
getwd()
file.names <- list.files(pattern="*.txt.gz")
sapply(file.names, FUN=function(file.name){
  system(paste("gunzip", file.name))
})
file.names <- list.files("./Data/")
```
